title: Trees are crucial to the future of our cities

title_detail.value: Trees are crucial to the future of our cities

summary: The shade of a single tree can provide welcome relief from the hot summer sun. But when that single tree is part of a small forest, it creates a profound cooling effect. Trees play a big role in keeping our towns and cities cool.
